---
name: Invalid by Design
about: Request rejected due to constitutional freeze
title: '[INVALID] '
labels: invalid-by-design
---

This request proposes a behavior change.

Echo systems are constitutionally frozen.
Memory, judgment, and audit boundaries are not subject to optimization.

If this change is required to strengthen permission,
prohibition, isolation, or auditability,
please resubmit with a constitutional argument.

Otherwise, this request is invalid by design.
